short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pets you can take care of!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take care of your very own panda, hippo or tiger! 

To see you animal go to google.com
-Move ur mouse left and right to pet!
-Tap to surprise your pet.
-Tap the food to feed your pet.

New updates coming, including more pets, more actions, better UI/UX, and more!
